_a-0000e63a-a5cb-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!originalTemplate: rule!AS_GCM_QR_getTemplate(
    templateIds: ri!template[recordType!AS GCM R Template.templateId],
    executeWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
      ri!template[recordType!AS GCM R Template.templateId]
    ),
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT
  ),
  local!originalTemplateClauses: rule!AS_GCM_QR_getTemplateClauseDetailsWithBatching(
    relationIds: ri!templateClauses[recordType!AS GCM Template Clause.relationId],
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    executeWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(
      ri!templateClauses[recordType!AS GCM Template Clause.relationId]
    ),
    batchingSize: cons!AS_GCM_INT_QUERY_BATCH_SIZE_LARGE
  ),
  a!map(
    template: rule!AS_GCM_setMetaDataForTemplateRecord(
      template: ri!template,
      initiator: ri!initiator
    ),
    originalTemplate: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(local!originalTemplateClauses),
      rule!AS_GCM_setRecordFields(
        record: local!originalTemplate,
        alwaysOverwrite: a!map(
          field: recordType!AS GCM R Template.templateClauses,
          value: local!originalTemplateClauses
        )
      ),
      local!originalTemplate
    )
  )
)

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_setRecordFields

_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_updateDataByModifierMaps
_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
The modifierMaps should have the below structure
{
a!map(
field: <The field which needs to be modified>,
find: Optional when findRegex is provided - The value to find,
findRegex: Optional when find is provided - The regex search performed to replace the value,
replaceWith: The value to replace with. When left blank the find values will be removed,
instanceNum: The instance number to which replace. Use only when the find is passed,
replaceAllInstances: Default true - Determines whether all the instances need to be replaced
applyWhen: When false this map will be skipped
),
...
}
*/
if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!modifierMaps),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!data,
    expression: reduce(
      rule!AS_GCM_updateDataByModifierMaps_Reducer(data: _, modifierMap: _),
      fv!item,
      ri!modifierMaps
    )
  ),
  ri!data
)

_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)

_a-0000e63a-a5cb-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QR_getTemplate

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_ADT_UT_calculateAudit_SingleObject

_a-0000e675-e3a8-8000-9bcb-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_GRD_includedAndExcludedClauses

_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QR_getRefData

_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_updateDataByModifierMaps_Reducer
_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  and(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(
      input: index(ri!data, ri!modifierMap.field, null)
    ),
    ri!modifierMap.applyWhen
  ),
  #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
    ri!data,
    ri!modifierMap.field,
    a!match(
      value: ri!modifierMap,
      whenTrue: and(
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.findRegex),
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.find)
      ),
      then: error(
        "Only one of two parameters should have values: findRegex or find"
      ),
      whenTrue: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.findRegex),
      then: if(
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.instanceNum),
        error(
          "instanceNum should be null when passing a value to findRegex"
        ),
        regexreplaceall(
          ri!modifierMap.findRegex,
          ri!data[ri!modifierMap.field],
          ri!modifierMap.replaceWith
        )
      ),
      whenTrue: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.find),
      then: rule!AS_GCM_substituteListFromTextUsingReduce(
        text: ri!data[ri!modifierMap.field],
        find: ri!modifierMap.find,
        replaceWith: ri!modifierMap.replaceWith,
        instanceNum: ri!modifierMap.instanceNum,
        replaceAllInstances: a!defaultValue(
          value: ri!modifierMap.replaceAllInstances,
          default: a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.instanceNum)
        )
      ),
      default: error(
        "Alteast one of two parameters should have values: findRegex or find"
      )
    )
  ),
  ri!data
)

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_compareStrong

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_CP_radioButtonField
_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!displayValue: displayvalue(
    ri!value,
    ri!choiceValues,
    ri!choiceLabels,
    null
  ),
  if(
    ri!readOnly,
    rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
      label: ri!label,
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      value: if(
        isnull(ri!readOnlyValue),
        local!displayValue,
        ri!readOnlyValue
      ),
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      showWhen: ri!showWhen,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonField_v1"(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
        label: ri!label,
        labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
        readOnly: ri!readOnly
      ),
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      choiceLabels: ri!choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!choiceValues,
      value: if(
        isnull(local!displayValue),
        null,
        ri!value
      ),
      saveInto: ri!saveInto,
      showWhen: if(isnull(ri!showWhen), true, ri!showWhen),
      required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
      /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
      requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
        label: ri!label,
        requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
      ),
      disabled: ri!disabled,
      choiceLayout: ri!choiceLayout,
      validations: ri!validations,
      validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
      choiceStyle: ri!choiceStyle
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e3c8-6861-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_triggerRefresh
_a-0000e3c8-6861-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*

Use this rule in any saveInto to update the value of a local variable triggerRefresh.

It should be used in conjunction with a local variable configured to refresh
whenever this rule is executed. To configure the local variable you intend to refresh,
set it up like this:

a!localVariables(
  local!triggerRefresh: now(),

  local!data: a!refreshVariable(
    value: ..(value definition)..,
    refreshOnVarChange: local!triggerRefresh
  )
)

*/

a!save(
  ri!triggerRefresh,
  now()
)

{

    ),

    ),

    ),

_a-0000e61a-f20f-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CO_DSP_primaryRecordListField
_a-0000e61a-f20f-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
  text: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(

      showWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!icon)
    ),
    ri!recordTitle
  },
  link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
    label: ri!recordTitle,
    recordtype: ri!recordType,

    showWhen: ri!linkShowWhen
  ),
  linkStyle: "STANDALONE",
  size: "STANDARD",
  style: ri!style,
  showWhen: ri!showWhen,
  color: ri!color
)

_a-0000e897-ddd7-8000-9c0c-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QR_getTemplateClauseDetailsWithBatching
_a-0000e897-ddd7-8000-9c0c-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!relationIds: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!relationIds,
    default: rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
      recordType: recordType!AS GCM Template Clause,
      returnType: a!defaultValue(
        value: ri!returnType,
        default: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
      ),
      pagingInfo: if(ri!returnType =cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_DATA_SUBSET, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(1,cons!AS_GCM_INT_QUERY_BATCH_SIZE_EXTRA_LARGE),null),
      filters: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM Template Clause.templateId,
          operator: "in",
          value: ri!templateIds
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM Template Clause.isActive,
          operator: "=",
          value: true(),
          applyWhen: ri!showInActive <> true()
        ),
        ri!additionalFilters
      },
      fields: {
        recordType!AS GCM Template Clause.relationId
      },
      logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
      triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
      executeWhen: and(
        ri!executeWhen,
        or(
          any(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
            {
              ri!additionalFilters,
              ri!logicalExpression,
              ri!aggregation
            }
          ),
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!templateIds),
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!relationIds)
        )
      )
    )[recordType!AS GCM Template Clause.relationId],
    
  ),
  local!batches: rule!AS_GCM_UT_getIdentifiersInBatches(
    identifiers: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(array: local!relationIds),
    batchingSize: a!defaultValue(
      ri!batchingSize,
      cons!AS_GCM_INT_QUERY_BATCH_SIZE_TINY
    ),
    returnType: ri!returnType,
    pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo
  ),
  local!selectionColumns: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!selectionColumns,
    default: if(
      ri!getOnlySimpleFields = true(),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
        array: {
          recordType!AS GCM Template Clause.relationId,
          recordType!AS GCM Template Clause.refClause.clauseId,
          recordType!AS GCM Template Clause.templateId,
          recordType!AS GCM Template Clause.refUsage.refDataId,
          recordType!AS GCM Template Clause.createdBy,
          recordType!AS GCM Template Clause.createdDatetime,
          recordType!AS GCM Template Clause.modifiedBy,
          recordType!AS GCM Template Clause.modifiedDatetime,
          recordType!AS GCM Template Clause.isActive,
          ri!selectAdditionalFieldsForWrite
        }
      ),
      {}
    )
  ),
  local!data: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!relationIds),
    {},
    a!flatten(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: local!batches,
        expression: if(
          and(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(input: local!selectionColumns),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(value: ri!aggregation)
          ),
          rule!AS_GCM_UT_nullifyEmptyNestedCdtFields(
            cdt: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
              
              type: #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:listtype?okey=a!listType"(recordType!AS GCM Template Clause),
              value: rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
                recordType: recordType!AS GCM Template Clause,
                returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
                
                filters: {
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                    field: recordType!AS GCM Template Clause.relationId,
                    operator: "in",
                    value: tointeger(fv!item.identifiers)
                  ),
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                    field: recordType!AS GCM Template Clause.isActive,
                    operator: "=",
                    value: true(),
                    applyWhen: ri!showInActive <> true()
                  ),
                  ri!additionalFilters
                },
                fields: local!selectionColumns,
                logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
                triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
                executeWhen: and(
                  ri!executeWhen,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(input: fv!item.identifiers)
                )
              )
            )
          ),
          rule!AS_GCM_QR_getTemplateClauseDetails(
            relationIds: fv!item.identifiers,
            returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
            executeWhen: and(
              ri!executeWhen,
              rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(input: fv!item.identifiers)
            ),
            aggregation: ri!aggregation,
            logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
            additionalFilters: ri!additionalFilters,
            
            triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
            sort: ri!sort,
            showInActive: ri!showInActive
          )
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  rule!AS_GCM_UT_formatDataBasedOnReturnType(
    data: local!data,
    pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
    returnType: ri!returnType
  )
)

_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFields

0002e63e-7f99-8000-1778-7f0000014e7a.name: AS GCM Create or Update Template

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_filterRecords
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords_Reducer(
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _
      ),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField
AS_CO_UT_not

_a-0000e675-e3a8-8000-9bcb-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_GRD_availableClausesCatalog
_a-0000e675-e3a8-8000-9bcb-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"(
  label: if(
    ri!isTemplate,
    "",
    ""
  ),
  labelSize: "MEDIUM",
  labelHeadingTag: "H2",
  labelColor: "SECONDARY",
  contents: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
      instructions: "",
      value: {
        if(
          ri!isTemplate,
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
            text: "Select the clauses to include in the template",
            color: "STANDARD"
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
            text: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
              bundle: ri!bundle,
              bundleKey: if(
                ri!isIncludeClausesPage,
                "ins_AvailableClauses",
                "ins_ExcludeClauseFromRule"
              )
            ),
            color: "STANDARD"
          )
        )
      }
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridField_v2"(
      label: if(
        ri!isTemplate,
        "",
        ""
      ),
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
      emptyGridMessage: "",
      data: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordData"(
        recordType: recordType!AS GCM R Clause,
        filters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.isActive,
          operator: "=",
          value: true
        )
      ),
      columns: {
        rule!AS_GCM_UI_refClauseTitleGridColumn(
          bundle: ri!bundle,
          linkShowWhen: false,
          showTruncatedClauseTitle: true
        )
      },
      pageSize: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_PAGE_SIZE_MEDIUM,
      initialSorts: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
        field: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.modifiedDatetime,
        ascending: false()
      ),
      selectable: true,
      selectionValue: a!flatten(ri!availableRefClauses)[recordType!AS GCM R Clause.clauseId],
      selectionSaveInto: {
        rule!AS_CO_UT_simpleGridSelectionSaveInto(target: ri!availableRefClauses)
      },
      disableRowSelectionWhen: contains(ri!unavailableClauseIds, fv!identifier),
      validations: {},
      shadeAlternateRows: false(),
      rowHeader: 1,
      accessibilityText: if(
        ri!isTemplate,
        "",
        ""
      ),
      refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
      refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION",
      userFilters: {
        #"urn:appian:user-filter:v1:83b74fc4-71d0-456a-8b20-12ea04b76cd1/72b58b53-ced9-4027-afa2-5946c8a16f3e",
        #"urn:appian:user-filter:v1:83b74fc4-71d0-456a-8b20-12ea04b76cd1/4b4bc120-45e6-45cf-962b-ddf5431b5fb8"
      },
      showSearchBox: true,
      showRefreshButton: false(),
      showExportButton: false(),
      actionsDisplay: "LABEL_AND_ICON"
    )
  },
  marginBelow: "NONE"
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_INP_paragraphField
_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  ri!readOnly,
  rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
    label: ri!label,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: ri!value,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
    align: null,
    showHyphenIfValueNull: ri!showHyphenIfValueNull
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: false
    ),
    height: ri!height,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    placeholder: ri!placeholder,
    value: ri!value,
    /* We are using nested saveIntos to automatically perform a trim on any value */
    /* before executing the actual saves */
    /* Saves can be nested in this format to allow for better reusability */
    saveInto: a!save(ri!saveInto, trim(save!value)),
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    validations: if(
      ri!readOnly,
      {},
      a!flatten(
        {
          ri!validations,
          rule!AS_CO_VD_textValidation(value: ri!value, maxLength: ri!maxLength)
        }
      )
    ),
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    accessibilitytext: ri!accessibilityText,
    characterLimit: ri!characterLimit,
    showCharacterCount: ri!showCharacterCount
  )
)

_a-0000e415-3035-8000-9bb2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_returnCdtFields_handler

_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName
_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!match(
  value: ri!colorName,
  /* White Colors */
  equals: "WHITE",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_WHITE,
  equals: "WHITE_2",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_WHITE_2,
  /* Gray Colors */
  equals: "GRAY_0",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_GRAY_0,
  equals: "GRAY_1",
  then: "#EDEDF2",
  equals: "GRAY_2",
  then: "#DCDCE5",
  equals: "GRAY_3",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_GRAY_3,
  equals: "GRAY_4",
  then: "#2E2E35",
  /* Orange Colors */
  equals: "ORANGE_1",
  then: "#FFEED3",
  equals: "ORANGE_2",
  then: "#FFDCA3",
  equals: "ORANGE_3",
  then: "#FAA92F",
  equals: "ORANGE_4",
  then: "#995C00",
  /* Blue Colors */
  equals: "BLUE_0",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_0,
  equals: "BLUE_1",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_1,
  equals: "BLUE_2",
  then: "#AFBFF8",
  equals: "BLUE_3",
  then: "#2322F0",
  equals: "BLUE_4",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_4,
  equals: "BLUE_5",
  then: "#E9EDFC",
  equals: "BLUE_6",
  then: "#08088D",
  equals: "BLUE_7",
  then: "#DCDEF5",
  /* Green Colors  */
  equals: "GREEN_1",
  then: "#E3FBDF",
  equals: "GREEN_4",
  then: "#117C00",
  /* Teal Colors */
  equals: "TEAL_1",
  then: "#E2FAF9",
  equals: "TEAL_3",
  then: "#56ADC0",
  equals: "TEAL_4",
  then: "#2C6770",
  /* Purple Colors */
  equals: "PURPLE_1",
  then: "#F2E9FF",
  equals: "PURPLE_3",
  then: "#B561FF",
  equals: "PURPLE_4",
  then: "#790DA1",
  /* Red Colors */
  equals: "RED_4",
  then: "#9F0019",
  /* Yellow Colors */
  equals: "YELLOW_0",
  then: "#FFFCEB",
  equals: "YELLOW_1",
  then: "#FFF6C9",
  equals: "YELLOW_4",
  then: "#856C00",
  /* Appian Colors */
  equals: "APPIAN_BACKGROUND",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_APPIAN_BACKGROUND,
  equals: "ACCENT",
  then: "#2322f0",
  default: ri!colorName
)

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_ADT_UT_calculateAudit
_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_ADT_UT_calculateAudit_MultipleObjects(
  originalObjects: ri!originalObjects,
  newObjects: ri!newObjects,
  auditConfig: ri!auditConfig,
  username: ri!username,
  externalAction: ri!externalAction,
  auditType: ri!auditType
)

_a-0000e915-02bc-8000-9c1f-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_substituteListFromTextUsingReduce

_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_DSP_clauseRecordTitle

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_ADT_UT_determineAuditActionCode
_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
choose(
  where(
    {
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!externalAction),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!originalObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!newObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", 1)) = toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", 1)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", false)),
      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))
    }
  )[1],
  ri!externalAction,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE
)

if(

    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: false
    ),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    placeholder: ri!placeholder,
    value: ri!value,
    /* We are using nested saveIntos to automatically perform a trim on any value */
    /* before executing the actual saves */
    /* Saves can be nested in this format to allow for better reusability */
    saveInto: a!save(ri!saveInto, trim(save!value)),
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    masked: ri!masked,
    validations: if(
      ri!readOnly,
      {},
      a!flatten(
        {
          ri!validations,
          rule!AS_CO_VD_textValidation(value: ri!value, maxLength: ri!maxLength)
        }
      )
    ),
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    align: ri!align,
    accessibilitytext: ri!accessibilityText,
    refreshAfter: ri!refreshAfter,
    characterLimit: ri!characterLimit,
    showCharacterCount: ri!showCharacterCount,
    inputPurpose: ri!inputPurpose
  )
)
